ygData.messageBody:
Yes. In fact rpgamer.com had an article on it.
It probably won't be as interactive as our EQ. And it is set in the past
(even further in the past than EQ that we know of).
I was also told by a sales rep at Babbages that Sony is coming out with
harddrives for the PS2.
luv,
-Su
